devdoc.author: Superfluid
devdoc.details: Please read IInstantDistributionAgreementV1 for implementation notes.For more technical notes, please visit protocol-monorepo wiki area.

params.indexId: The specified indexId of the newly created index
The specified indexId of the updated index
params.totalUnitsApproved: The total units approved when the indexValue was updated
params.totalUnitsPending: The total units pending when the indexValue was updated

Initialized(uint8).details: Triggered when the contract has been initialized or reinitialized.

params.ctx: Context bytes (see ISuperfluid.sol for Context struct)

proxiableUUID().details: Proxiable UUID marker function, this would help to avoid wrong logic      contract to be used for upgrading. NOTE: The semantics of the UUID deviates from the actual UUPS standard,       where it is equivalent of _IMPLEMENTATION_SLOT.

_MAX_NUM_SUBS.details: Maximum number of subscriptions a subscriber can have

_PUBLISHER_DEPOSIT_STATE_SLOT_ID.details: Publisher state slot id for storing its deposit amount

_SUBSCRIBER_SUBS_BITMAP_STATE_SLOT_ID.details: Subscriber state slot id for storing subs bitmap

_SUBSCRIBER_SUB_DATA_STATE_SLOT_ID_START.details: Subscriber state slot id starting ptoint for subscription data

_UNALLOCATED_SUB_ID.details: A special id that indicating the subscription is not approved yet
